item.title: New car prices soar to historic high as buyers face mounting sticker shock
item.description: Car prices are nearing a historic milestone as the average cost of a new vehicle approaches $50,000, with buyers facing $766 monthly payments and risi...

item.title: Middle-income Americans pessimistic about their financial future amid persistent inflation, analysis shows
item.description: Study reveals only 21% of middle-income Americans expect better finances next year, down from 33% in 2020, as inflation creates widespread pessimism.

item.title: Trump's $2K tariff dividends could carry a hefty price tag

item.title: Voters express economic worries over inflation as costs rise, Fox News poll finds
item.description: A Fox News poll shows 76% of voters view the economy negatively, with 61% disapproving of President Donald Trump's economic handling amid rising costs...

item.title: DEI consultant resigns from Cracker Barrel board after heated proxy fight
item.description: Cracker Barrel shareholders backed nine of 10 board nominees, including CEO Julie Felss Masino.
